thread.title: Novartis acquires all remaining rights to GSK's Ofatumumab to develop treatments for MS and other autoimmune indications

title: Novartis acquires all remaining rights to GSK's Ofatumumab to develop treatments for MS and other autoimmune indications
text:
Novartis AG 21/08/2015 | Press release Novartis acquires all remaining rights to GSK's Ofatumumab to develop treatments for MS and other autoimmune indications 
distributed by noodls on 21/08/2015 05:51
